fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Initiatives des institutions européennes relatives au marché intérieur, à l'accès aux marchés internationaux, à la protection de la propriété intellectuelle, au développement de la formation et à l'émergence d'un marché numérique unique.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: A global Luxury group, Kering develops an ensemble of luxury houses in fashion, leather goods, jewellery and watches, as well as Sport & Lifestyle brands.
